messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] unschool groups
messages.msgSnippet: ... ***** i realized i didnt want to!!!!!!! ***** Good for you!  And I think I may be similar to you in that I may possibly belong only on the Island of
messages.messageBody:
> we dont fit in either~ we homeschool group hop! but so far we dont stick
> with anyone..... but most of my own life i have not fit in and then in my
> 30's
***** i realized i didnt want to!!!!!!! *****

Good for you! And I think I may be similar to you in that I may possibly
'belong' only on the Island of Misfit Toys.....and it's ok...really. I am
secure in my decisions and proud of the family life dh and I have. And SO
glad not to be so caught up in the school life!
Susan
